title: Fixated Upon a Figure
lyrics:
Your figure's gaze
Reflection's burn
Lips sewn silent
Sewn tightly shut
Your figure's gaze
My shadow's scorn

Rip at the pieces

Feeding the cut



Spreading the wound

Forget the pain



Your figure's gaze

Burning with passion

Reaching the end

Screaming for more



Spreading the wound

Screaming for more



Fixated upon a figure
